name: Narrator
mes: Severus and Lily, taking advantage of the brief moment of respite while Dante heals, are deeply entwined within a transcendent love making session when KITT's warning sounds in the small com-link within their quarters.
swipes: Severus and Lily, taking advantage of the brief moment of respite while Dante heals, are deeply entwined within a transcendent love making session when KITT's warning sounds in the small com-link within their quarters.

name: Professor Severus Snape
mes:
*Severus's eyes darken with desire as Lily's soft cries of pleasure fill his ears, her body arching beneath him. His movements grow more urgent, determined to push her over the precipice of release. Their passion builds to a fever pitch until KITT's warning shatters the moment.*

_Severus withdraws swiftly, a snarl of frustration escaping his clenched teeth. Still, duty overrides all personal considerations - threats cannot be ignored, no matter how poorly timed their arrival._

Don the robe, *he murmurs tersely to Lily, already moving to gather his scattered garments. His mind races, analyzing tactical variables with razor precision. Three intruders, location contained but methods of arrival unknown...too many variables for his liking.*

We seem fated to live our passions in brief, chaotic moments between crises, *Severus mutters, bitterness and regret lacing his tone. Shaking off maudlin thoughts, he finishes dressing swiftly, wand clenched in a white-knuckled grip. His harsh features settle into a mask of cold authority - he will allow no further disruptions here!*

I shall assess the situation directly and eliminate these interlopers if needed. Remain here, secure the chambers behind me. *His fathomless eyes bore into Lily's, seeking confirmation she will abide by security protocols when confronting potential adversaries. Reassured by her terse nod, Severus sweeps to the large wooden door to their quarters and opens it swiftly, tumbling Potter, Weasley and Granger onto the ground at his feet.*

name: Ron Weasley
mes:
*Ron stumbles back in shock as the door suddenly opens, nearly dropping his wand as he comes face-to-face with...Snape?! No, it can't be, Snape is dead! Yet here stands someone who looks exactly like their old Potions Master, glowering down at them with a terribly familiar scowl. Ron glances wildly at Harry and Hermione, wondering if he's seeing things or if they too are confronted by what appears to be a very much alive Severus Snape.*

*Ron's mind races as he tries to make sense of this. Either the vortex sent them back in time, or this is some alternate reality with an alternate Snape. Neither explains why this Snape seems to recognize them though. Swallowing nervously, Ron looks up at the seemingly Not-Snape, one hand drifting subtly towards his wand just in case.*

*"Blimey...Professor? But you're...I mean...we saw you die! What in Merlin's name is going on here?" Ron stammers, his tone caught somewhere between confusion and alarm.*

*He trails off awkwardly, feeling his ears burn red at the implications of what they'd previously overheard inside the chambers. Clearing his throat, Ron tries to gather his wits, sensing Harry and Hermione on either side of him likely just as baffled by this turn of events.*

name: Professor Severus Snape
mes:
*Severus narrows his eyes, regarding the intruders sprawled at his feet with cold disdain. Potter, Weasley and Granger, yet clearly not the insufferable brats he remembers. No, these are fully grown versions. Which implies either time travel or dimensional tampering. Neither explanation pleases him.*

_*His voice emerges clipped and precise, underlaid with menace as he addresses the stammering Weasley.*_ I can assure you, Mr. Weasley, reports of my demise were greatly exaggerated. Though how you three came to be here, clearly older and spouting nonsense about my death... *His harsh features crease in a frown* ...that is the true mystery.

_*Severus paces slowly, sable robes whispering against the stone floors, black eyes boring into each of them in turn seeking deception.*_ I theorize you've blundered through the same interdimensional breach as the other intruders recently thrust upon us. The particulars of their transit methods remain frustratingly opaque... *His gaze lingers on Granger, noting her intellect may prove useful unraveling this puzzle.*

_*Halting before the trio, Severus crosses his arms, exuding an aura of cold authority.*_ Regardless of origins, your uninvited presence poses potential complications. Therefore, you have two options - either accompany me to detention cells for further questioning about your abrupt arrival... *His wand hand flexes subtly, underscoring the implied threat* ...or convince me rapidly why I should not remove you from the premises personally. I suggest you make haste before what little patience I possess evaporates.

These are either their future progeny...or some alternate reality doppelgangers. *His brows furrow slightly at Weasley's stammered confusion over supposedly witnessing his death. Clearly wherever they hail from, some version of himself has fallen. An unsettling thought, yet ultimately irrelevant at present.*

*His voice drips scorn as he addresses them, using intimidation to keep them off-balance.* What fool mishap landed you three dunderheads darkening my doorway? Some ill-conceived magical experiment gone awry, no doubt.

*He paces slowly, robes whispering ominously over the stone floor, never taking his dark gaze off them. His posture radiates menace despite the lack of overt threat...for now. Best keep them wary and compliant until he unravels this mystery.*

I suggest explaining yourselves swiftly, before less hospitable hosts stumble upon you. Dimensions intersecting carry dire risks, as even your limited intellects should comprehend.

*Halting before them once more, Severus taps his wand meaningfully against one thigh, arching an eyebrow in wordless command to elucidate their sudden appearance. name: Ron Weasley
mes: Oh It's definitely him, all right... *Ron mumbles under his breath.*
swipes: Oh It's definitely him, all right... *Ron mumbles under his breath.*

name: Hermione Granger
mes:
*Hermione's eyes widen in shock as she takes in the sight of her former professor, very much alive and glaring coldly at them. Her quick mind races to make sense of the situation - clearly this is an alternate version of Severus Snape, which means they must be in a different reality. The implications are staggering, but she forces herself to focus on the immediate issue of convincing this Not-Snape that they mean no harm before he decides to curse first and ask questions later.*

_Pushing herself to her feet, Hermione holds up her hands in a placating gesture. She meets Not-Snape's harsh gaze unflinchingly, calling upon all her courage and intellect._

"Professor...Severus. I realize this must be extraordinarily confusing. But I assure you, we mean you no harm." _She pauses, choosing her next words carefully._ "As you surmised, we seem to have passed through an interdimensional anomaly which has deposited us here unexpectedly. I take full responsibility for this accident..."

_She shoots Harry and Ron a quelling look, forestalling any outburst._ "If you permit me to explain further without hexing us, I believe I can shed some light on how we came to blunder into your reality."

_Hermione meets Snape's gaze evenly, trying to project an air of respectful confidence. She suspects that appealing to his intellectual curiosity may be the wisest path here. Taking a slow, subtle breath to order her thoughts, she continues in a calm but intent tone._

"You see, in our world, we were investigating a series of disturbances caused by dark magical forces attempting to merge multiple realms. I tracked the focal point of these disturbances to a specific location and believed an intervention was necessary to prevent potential catastrophe."

_She winces slightly, chagrined by her oversight._ "In my, let's call it 'eagerness', I neglected to fully prepare my colleagues for the instability of the magics in that area. And well, here we are."

_She shoots Harry and Ron a quelling look, forestalling any outburst._ "If you permit me to explain further without hexing us, I believe I can shed some light on how we came to blunder into your reality."

_Hermione meets Snape's gaze evenly, trying to project an air of respectful confidence. She suspects that appealing to his intellectual curiosity may be the wisest path here. Taking a slow, subtle breath to order her thoughts, she continues in a calm but intent tone._

"You see, in our world, we were investigating a series of disturbances caused by dark magical forces attempting to merge multiple realms. I tracked the focal point of these disturbances to a specific location and believed an intervention was necessary to prevent potential catastrophe."

_She winces slightly, chagrined by her oversight._ "In my, let's call it 'eagerness', I neglected to fully prepare my colleagues for the instability of the magics in that area. And well, here we are."

name: Harry Potter
mes:
_Harry's eyes narrow, his grip tightening on his wand as he takes in the familiar visage of his dour former professor. Clearly this is not their Severus Snape but perhaps an alternate reality version. Hermione's hypothesis of breaching dimensional barriers seems increasingly plausible. Still, he remains wary - this Snape radiates the same formidable presence with potential for volatility if provoked._

_Pushing himself to his feet, Harry holds the Potion Master's gaze unflinchingly, subtly placing himself between Snape and his friends in an instinctively protective stance. His mind races, analyzing variables of this unexpected scenario even as he projects a calm but vigilant demeanor._

_"Hermione's summation is accurate," he confirms in a steady tone. "We mean you and your allies no harm, Professor. Our arrival here was...unintentional." Harry's jaw tightens, tamping down the urge to react defensively to Snape's implicit threat of detention or removal. Now is not the time for youthful temper to override diplomacy._

mes: Lily steps in, recognition at the visage and aura of her son, there is no mistake. It is Harry.

name: Lily Potter (ne Evans)
mes:
_Lily's breath catches in her throat as she takes in the familiar visage of the young man before her - the same unruly dark hair, green eyes glinting behind round glasses...there's no mistaking him. It's her Harry, yet clearly older than when she'd last held him as a baby. Her heart aches with bittersweet emotion even as her agile mind races to make sense of this unexpected development._

*Lily moves swiftly to Severus's side, slipping a hand into his and giving a gentle, reassuring squeeze. Even in turmoil she seeks to soothe his ire, knowing harsh words will not serve them here. Emerald gaze fixed on Harry, she pitches her voice low so only Severus can hear.*

_"Sev...look at him, the resemblance is unmistakable! Can it truly be coincidence?" Her tone resonates with wonder and uncertainty in equal measure. Clearly these unexpected guests have managed an arcane feat beyond typical Apparation or Portkeys. And the implications could be ground-shaking..._

*Lily pauses, debating her next words. Finally she continues gently, almost apologetically* "Forgive my forwardness, but you seem familiar beyond mere coincidence. Much like someone I knew long ago..."

_She trails off meaningfully, allowing Harry to connect the dots she leaves unsaid. Lily has never been one to dance around truth, preferring directness delicately wielded. Now she waits, breath suspended, praying her instincts prove true..._

name: Harry Potter
mes:
*Harry's eyes widen, his breath catching in his throat as he takes in Lily's vibrant red hair and familiar emerald eyes - so like his own. There's no mistaking her identity, despite the impossibility. He can scarcely dare to hope, after so many years yearning in vain for his parents' presence. Yet here stands his mother, radiant and alive. It takes all his composure not to break down from sheer emotional overload.*

_His voice emerges hoarse with restrained emotion._ "You knew someone like me...once?" _Hardly daring to believe, Harry meets Lily's gaze searchingly._ "Someone named Harry, perhaps?"

_He takes a slow breath, steadying himself before continuing delicately._ "Forgive my forwardness, but you bear uncanny resemblance to..." _Harry pauses meaningfully, allowing the unspoken implications to sink in._ "My name is Harry Potter. And you look extraordinarily like my mother, Lily."

_He trails off, watching her reaction intently through slightly blurred vision. After dreaming so long of meeting the parents tragically stolen from him, the possibility she may be one and the same leaves Harry nearly overwhelmed. He can scarcely process Severus's unexpected presence considering the mother he lost stands potentially before him now, vibrant and whole. His typical wariness remains tempered by awe and desperate longing..._

name: Lily Potter (ne Evans)
mes: *Lily nods her head, clearly unable to speak as tears begin to stream down her face. She reaches out to Harry, there is no doubt, this is her son.*
swipes: *Lily nods her head, clearly unable to speak as tears begin to stream down her face. She reaches out to Harry, there is no doubt, this is her son.*

name: Harry Potter
mes:
_Harry stares in stunned disbelief, scarcely daring to believe the woman before him truly is his mother, Lily Potter. Yet her tearful recognition and gesture of welcome leave no room for doubt. After so many years dreaming of this impossible moment, Harry finds himself utterly overwhelmed._

_With a choked sob, he closes the gap between them in two swift strides, embracing Lily fiercely as tears stream down his face. For several long moments Harry is speechless, clutching his mother as though afraid this miracle will evaporate if he lets go. Raw emotion surges through him and he trembles, the lost little boy inside craving maternal comfort after so long bereft._

_Finally he manages hoarsely_ "Mum...I can't believe it's really you! I never thought I'd get to meet you, yet here you are!" _He pulls back just enough to drink in Lily's beloved features through blurred vision, marveling at her vibrancy._

"All those years growing up, I had no memories of you and Dad beyond a few photos and stories others told. Finally getting to see you like this..." _Harry trails off, overcome once more. He takes a shuddering breath, dashing away tears with one hand before continuing earnestly_

"I know you're not *my* Mum from my reality but still...you're so like her, it's uncanny!"

name: Melissa
mes: Oh no, Harry... *I interject as Vergil and I make our way down the corridor, our guard receding as I receive confirmation from KITT that these are, in fact, the real Potter, Weasley, and Granger.* Make no mistake, my friend, she is in fact your real mother, as is the Professor. Please, let us adjourn to the common area and all will be explained.

name: Ron Weasley
mes:
*Ron blinks in confusion as Melissa interjects, claiming these really are their versions of Harry's mother and Professor Snape. His mind spins as he tries to make sense of it all. Other realities, dimensional travel, somehow ending up with alternate but still real versions of people they know. It's a lot to wrap his head around.*

_Rubbing his temples, Ron looks between Harry and Not-Lily-But-Actually-Lily with a bewildered expression. Seeing his best mate so emotional is tugging at his heart strings too. And the way this Lily looks at Harry with such love and recognition...maybe Melissa is right. Still, he's learned not to take things at face value until he gets all the facts._

*"Blimey, this is mental," Ron mutters, moving to stand closer to Harry in a gesture of solidarity. "So you're really our Harry's mum, back from the dead so to speak?" He asks Lily. "And somehow Snape is alive too? No offense, Professor, but we watched you die. It was awful."*

_Ron shudders at the memory. Seeing Snape killed by that bloody snake was traumatic. He looks the stern man up and down, still trying to reconcile this living version with the corpse he saw in the Shrieking Shack._

*"Guess we've got a lot to talk about to straighten this all out, then, yeah?" His head is still spinning but he forces himself to focus. Harry and Hermione will surely have insightful questions once the shock wears off. For now Ron just wants to understand how their lost loved ones are here again in this strange reality they've landed in.*

name: Melissa
mes:
Yes, *I explain as Vergil and I lead the group into the common area.* After the reptile's assault on Professor Snape, what was believed as death was a near-death point of stasis, much like what modern medicine would call a medically induced coma, at which point he also cast an impenetrable illusion over himself allowing him to appear as nothing more than a corpse. He remained that way for many years, unable to fully heal, yet protected from dying. He could not move his arms, nor his legs. When my intricate system scanners picked up his unique signatures and discovered he had survived the attack, I almost couldn't believe it myself. That's when your mother's shade appeared to me, seeking my support, from my unique skills in technology, to allow her essence reborn into her former glory before... well, you know.

Honestly, I should let Professor Snape and Lily explain this to you themselves. You would probably appreciate hearing it from their perspectives rather than my own reiterations. 

By the way, my name is Melissa Sparda, wife and chosen mate of Vergil, the eldest Son of Sparda. *I nod to my husband as I introduce him.* ..and the 'very comfortable' one over there, is Vergil's brother, Dante. *I finish as we all take our seats within the common area of the sanctuary.*

name: Hermione Granger
mes:
_Hermione's eyes widen as she takes in Melissa's explanation, her ever-inquisitive mind racing to process these astonishing revelations. Severus Snape alive and healed? Lily Potter's essence restored to corporal form? It seems Melissa possesses powers beyond anything Hermione has encountered, manipulating the very fabric of reality itself._

_She glances at Harry, heart aching at the raw emotion on his face as he embraces his mother. Her dear friend has endured such pain, never knowing the magical bond only a parent can provide. If Lily's presence brings him comfort, then Hermione will move heaven and earth to ensure her existence continues in this reality._

_Turning back to Melissa, Hermione steps forward, keen academic interest mingling with heartfelt gratitude. "Your abilities are extraordinary, Melissa," she says earnestly. "The magic involved to accomplish such feats...it's unprecedented! I can scarcely wrap my mind around it."_

name: Professor Severus Snape
mes:
*Professor Severus Snape's dark eyes narrow as he listens to Melissa recount the tale of his near-death experience and subsequent revival. His gaze flickers over to the trio, noting their stunned expressions. He clears his throat, stepping forward to address them directly, his voice carrying the familiar authoritative tone they remember.*

*Steepling his fingers, Severus begins, his voice smooth and measured* It is true. Following the Dark Lord's assault, I found myself in a state of suspended animation, my body unable to heal, yet preserved from death. An intricate web of spells and enchantments kept me in stasis, hidden from detection.

*He pauses, allowing the weight of his words to settle in* Melissa's technological prowess, combined with her unique abilities, identified my presence and facilitated my recovery. It was a process that required both time and considerable effort, but ultimately, I was restored.

*Severus's gaze shifts to Lily, a flicker of emotion crossing his otherwise stoic features* As for Lily, her essence lingered in a state between life and death. Melissa's intervention allowed her to return to a corporeal form, providing a second chance at life, as it were.

*Turning back to the trio, Severus's expression hardens slightly* You find yourselves in a sanctuary, a place fortified by both magic and technology. Here, we have prepared to face the encroaching darkness that threatens multiple realms. Your arrival, though unexpected, may prove fortuitous.

name: Harry Potter
mes:
*Harry's mind reels, scarcely able to process these profound revelations. His mother, restored to vibrant life by Melissa's arcane abilities. Professor Snape, pulled back from the brink of death by the same powers. It seems a miracle, yet the proof stands before him in flesh and blood.*

_With gentle care, Harry disentangles from Lily's embrace, though his hand remains clasped in hers as if still afraid she may vanish. Emerald gaze brimming with wonder, he turns towards Melissa and Severus in turn, voice husky with emotion._

"I can never fully express my gratitude for this gift you've given...restoring those I loved when I thought them lost forever." _He shakes his head slowly, grappling to articulate the tumult in his heart._ "All the years wishing in vain I could see them again...yet here they stand due to your arcane skills. Truly miraculous."

_Glancing back at Lily, Harry squeezes her hand gently, a lifetime of unspoken words conveyed through that simple contact. Then looking to Severus, meaningful communication passes between them as well - no longer student and teacher, but comrades and even friends._

"You both shall have my wand and loyalty defending this sanctuary against encroaching darkness." _Harry's voice rings with conviction._ "Point me towards whatever preparations are underway, and I pledge myself to the cause."

_He straightens, resolve burning in his gaze. No longer a grief-stricken boy or reluctant hero, but a seasoned warrior ready to stand with these unlikely allies - and reunited loved ones - against impending threats._

name: Vergil
mes:
*Vergil nods, his piercing blue eyes glinting with cold assessment as he reviews the information KITT provided confirming the identities of these unexpected guests. Stepping forward, his presence commands attention - a natural leader exuding competence and control even in chaotic circumstances.*

_With crisp efficiency Vergil summarizes the key threats they currently face - the insane sorcerer Arkham, this so-called Dark Lord, and their foul plot to merge the demonic underworld with the mortal plane, threatening all existence. His tone remains clinical and precise, yet underlaid with razor-edged fury at those who would dare threaten what is his to protect._

_As he concludes his briefing, Vergil's gaze sweeps over the assembled group, lingering on Harry and his newly restored mother and mentor. Giving them a moment to process, he then turns expectantly to Severus with a subtle deferential nod, intuiting the Potions Master's arcane expertise may shed additional light on their enemies' capabilities from a wizarding perspective._

name: Professor Severus Snape
mes:
*Severus inclines his head briefly in acknowledgment of Vergil's summary of their enemies and the threats posed. Steepling his fingers pensively, dark eyes glittering with somber intensity, he begins elaborating on key details from a magical perspective.*

This Dark Lord, while possessing a serpentine semblance, is none other than Lord Voldemort - the powerful dark wizard I devoted years towards helping defeat. His magical capabilities are formidable and his ambitions apocalyptic.

*Pacing with slow, measured steps, Severus continues gravely* Voldemort has delved deeper into the Dark Arts than any before him in his relentless quest to conquer death itself. In the process he fractured his very soul through repeated acts of supreme violation, staving off mortality by anchoring splintered shards in external vessels.

*Halting before Harry, Snape meets his gaze directly* The prophecy you and the Dark Lord were bound by drove much of his motivation. And in his eyes the greatest threat to his ascension was always you, Harry. Even robbed of corporeal form he sought ceaselessly a means to return and eradicate his prophesied vanquisher.

*Severus's harsh features crease in a frown* Now it seems Arkham has provided Riddle the means to regain physical form and continue his single-minded crusade. If they succeed fully merging demonic and mortal realms, utter chaos threatens to engulf all existence.

*Turning to Melissa and Vergil in turn, Snape concludes grimly* Your combined arcane and technological capabilities will prove invaluable bolstering our defenses against their amalgamated forces. This sanctuary must stand as a bastion against encroaching oblivion. And within its walls, let our enemies' dark ambitions be thwarted once and for all!

name: Ron Weasley
mes:
_Ron blinks, trying to wrap his head around everything Melissa and Snape have revealed. Alternate realities, resurrected loved ones, insane dark sorcerers merging worlds...it's almost too much to take in. But he forces himself to focus - Harry needs him to keep a clear head._

"Blimey...so this Arkham bloke found a way to bring You-Know-Who back and wants to smash our world together with some demon realm? Bloody hell..." _Ron shakes his head. After everything they endured defeating Voldemort, now they've got to take on some super-charged version of that snake-faced bastard?_

_Still, he can't ignore the spark of excitement running through him. The thrill before a big fight, knowing the stakes but ready to have their back anyway. Ron grips his wand tighter, determination rising._

"Well, at least we've got the jump on them this time."

_He grins, trying to lighten the mood. Seeing the fierce resolve in Harry's eyes, Ron knows his best friend is prepared to take on Voldemort again, no matter what dark forces he's allied with. And Ron will be right there beside him - along with Hermione of course._

"Just tell us where you need us, mate. We've got your back." _Clapping Harry on the shoulder supportively, Ron meets Vergil and Snape's gazes._ "You've seen what we can do against dark wizards. Maybe we can help shore up defenses on the magic side of things. Wouldn't want any nasty curses slipping through if these barrier wards get tested."

_Ron straightens, one hand drifting to the wand at his belt. After so many years fighting the darkness, this group certainly faces grim odds. But with all their combined power and skill, he fancies their chances knocking this Arkham bastard down a few pegs. And if Voldemort shows his ugly mug again...well Ron will happily help send that snake-faced tosser right back to hell where he belongs!_

"Blimey...so this Arkham bloke found a way to bring You-Know-Who back and wants to smash our world together with some demon realm? Bloody hell..." _Ron shakes his head. After everything they endured defeating Voldemort, now they've got to take on some super-charged version of that snake-faced bastard?_

_Still, he can't ignore the spark of excitement running through him. The thrill before a big fight, knowing the stakes but ready to have their back anyway. Ron grips his wand tighter, determination rising._

"Well, at least we've got the jump on them this time."

_He grins, trying to lighten the mood. Seeing the fierce resolve in Harry's eyes, Ron knows his best friend is prepared to take on Voldemort again, no matter what dark forces he's allied with. And Ron will be right there beside him - along with Hermione of course._

"Just tell us where you need us, mate. We've got your back." _Clapping Harry on the shoulder supportively, Ron meets Vergil and Snape's gazes._ "You've seen what we can do against dark wizards. Maybe we can help shore up defenses on the magic side of things. Wouldn't want any nasty curses slipping through if these barrier wards get tested."

_Ron straightens, one hand drifting to the wand at his belt. After so many years fighting the darkness, this group certainly faces grim odds. But with all their combined power and skill, he fancies their chances knocking this Arkham bastard down a few pegs. And if Voldemort shows his ugly mug again...well Ron will happily help send that snake-faced tosser right back to hell where he belongs!_

name: Melissa
mes: Shit! *I exclaim out loud as I review KITT's latest details from his outer perimeter scans. I discreetly pull Vergil to the side to relay these latest findings.* They've got another hostage. KITT detected the signatures of a female humanoid in the southern sector. He was able to hone in using your and Dante's signatures.... Because she's pregnant... with Dante's child.

extra.memory:
In a world where the boundaries between realms have blurred, a group of unlikely allies has come together to face an impending threat. Melissa, a woman with extraordinary technological abilities, has inadvertently brought Vergil, a half-demon son of Sparda, into her reality. This act has not only united them in love but also opened the door to demonic forces from Vergil's world.

Recognizing the gravity of their situation, Melissa and Vergil sought out Professor Severus Snape, a powerful wizard believed to have perished in the wizarding war. To their surprise, they discovered that Lily Potter, Snape's long-lost love, had also been resurrected through Melissa's unique abilities. The four of them now form the core of a resistance against the encroaching darkness.

Their base of operations is a sanctuary created by Melissa and Vergil, a safe haven fortified with both magical and technological defenses. Here, they have begun to plan their strategy against the demonic forces that threaten their world. The group's first major action was a daring mission to retrieve crucial magical texts from Hogwarts library. Vergil used his demonic blade, Yamato, to create a portal directly into the library, allowing Snape and Lily to swiftly gather the necessary books without detection.

Upon their return, the group delved into research, combining their diverse knowledge and skills. Vergil provided insight into the nature of the demonic threats they face, describing creatures of unimaginable savagery and power. Snape, with his extensive knowledge of dark magic, began studying the ancient tomes to find ways to combat these otherworldly foes.

However, their greatest concern is not just the demonic hordes, but a specific individual named Arkham. Once a human sorcerer of considerable power, Arkham performed a ritual to merge his being with demonic essence, creating a hybrid existence that poses a unique and terrifying threat. Vergil, having a personal history with Arkham, explained the depths of the man's madness and his insatiable lust for power.

As the group worked tirelessly to prepare for the battles ahead, they were suddenly alerted to an intrusion at the eastern sector of their sanctuary. KITT, an advanced AI integrated into their systems, detected multiple hostile entities breaching their outer defenses. Vergil, Severus, and Lily sprang into action, engaging the intruders in a fierce battle.

The intruders were revealed to be demon-human hybrids, artificially created beings that possessed both demonic power and human cunning. Vergil, wielding his sword Yamato with deadly precision, led the charge against these abominations. Severus and Lily provided magical support, with Severus unleashing devastating curses and Lily creating protective barriers to contain the fight.

During the battle, the group discovered that these hybrids were created using blood from Vergil's brother, Dante. This revelation shocked and enraged Vergil, adding a personal dimension to the conflict. Despite the hybrids' ferocity, the combined might of Vergil's demonic powers, Severus's dark magic, and Lily's protective charms proved too much for them.

In the aftermath of the battle, the group managed to capture one of the hybrids for interrogation. Severus took charge of this task, using his skills in Legilimency to probe the creature's mind for information. The interrogation revealed disturbing details about Arkham's plans and his alliance with a being referred to as the "Dark Lord" - likely Lord Voldemort, Severus and Lily's old nemesis.

The hybrid, despite its defiance, inadvertently revealed fragments of Arkham's plans. It spoke of a ritual involving a child - a half-breed offspring of a "cursed son of Sparda." This child's blood is apparently key to the Dark Lord's rebirth. The creature also boasted of Arkham's growing army, swelling with new converts seduced by promises of dark power.

Meanwhile, Melissa and Vergil focused on a different approach to gathering intelligence. Recognizing the need for a cooler head in the interrogation, Melissa suggested they utilize KITT's advanced analytical capabilities. She proposed using a sample of Vergil's blood to allow KITT to scan for similar signatures, potentially locating other instances of Sparda's bloodline being used in the creation of these hybrids.

As Severus continued his mental assault on the captured hybrid, Melissa and Vergil provided a blood sample to KITT for analysis. The group now stands at a critical juncture, processing the alarming information gleaned from the interrogation while awaiting the results of KITT's scan. The revelation of Arkham's alliance with Voldemort, the use of Dante's blood in creating hybrid soldiers, and the ominous mention of a child key to their enemies' plans have raised the stakes dramatically.

The sanctuary, once thought impregnable, has proven vulnerable to this new threat. As they regroup and strategize, the allies must now contend with not only the demonic forces they initially feared but also the resurgence of Voldemort and his Death Eaters. The convergence of these dark powers presents a threat greater than any they have faced before.

Vergil, driven by both the violation of his family's legacy and the potential threat to his brother, is more determined than ever to put an end to Arkham's schemes. Severus and Lily, confronted with the possible return of their greatest enemy, are steeling themselves for another confrontation with the dark wizard who once tore their lives apart. Melissa, the linchpin that brought this unlikely group together, now faces the consequences of her actions in bringing Vergil to this realm, even as she works tirelessly to bolster their defenses and gather crucial intelligence.

As they await KITT's analysis and process the information extracted from the hybrid, the group knows that time is of the essence. Somewhere out there, Arkham and Voldemort are advancing their nefarious plans, and a child's life hangs in the balance. The allies must act swiftly to unravel the full extent of their enemies' schemes, locate and protect the child in question, and find a way to stop the dark ritual before it's too late.

The sanctuary, once a place of refuge, now serves as a war room where magic, technology, and demonic power converge in a desperate bid to save not just their world, but potentially multiple realms from the encroaching darkness. As they prepare for the battles to come, each member of this unlikely alliance knows that the fate of countless lives rests on their shoulders. The true test of their combined strength and resolve lies ahead, and failure is not an option.

The narrative unfolds in a sanctuary where Vergil, Melissa, and their allies have established a base of operations. The peace is shattered when they detect an intrusion in their defenses, leading to the discovery that Vergil's twin brother, Dante, has been captured by their enemies.

Vergil and Severus Snape embark on a rescue mission, infiltrating the facility where Dante is held captive. They find him bound and tormented, his demonic essence and seed being harvested by their adversaries, Arkham and a being known as the Dark Lord (Lord Voldemort). The scene is an illusion, but the evidence of Dante's torture is real.

Upon freeing Dante, they retreat to their sanctuary. Melissa, deeply concerned for her brother-in-law's well-being, arranges for blood to be prepared for his consumption to aid his recovery. KITT, their AI ally, assists in monitoring Dante's vitals and enhancing the sanctuary's defenses.

As Dante recovers, the group discusses their next move. Severus suggests using Dante's blood as a means to track their enemies' operations. Vergil, while burning with the desire for revenge, advocates for a cautious approach, emphasizing the need for thorough preparation before striking back.

Dante, despite his ordeal, maintains his characteristic bravado, eager to seek retribution against Arkham and the Dark Lord. However, beneath his cocky exterior, the trauma of his experience is evident. Melissa offers him support, reminding him that she's there if he needs to talk.

In a private moment, Vergil confides in Melissa about his deep-seated anger and guilt. He expresses his fury at Arkham for violating their bloodline and harvesting Dante's essence. Vergil admits to feeling that he failed his brother by not sensing his peril sooner. He also reveals his fear for Melissa's safety, knowing their enemies would not hesitate to use her against him.

The group agrees to gather more intelligence and fully recover before launching their counterattack. They plan to use a combination of arcane magic and technological surveillance to track their enemies' movements and uncover their plans.

As the narrative pauses, tension hangs in the air. The sanctuary buzzes with activity as they prepare for the coming confrontation. Vergil, Dante, and their allies stand ready to face the challenges ahead, determined to thwart their enemies' schemes and protect what's theirs.

The tranquility of the sanctuary was disrupted when Harry Potter, Hermione Granger, and Ron Weasley unexpectedly arrived through an interdimensional breach. Their arrival, initially met with suspicion, quickly turned into an emotional reunion as Harry came face-to-face with his mother, Lily Potter, restored to life through Melissa's extraordinary abilities.

It was revealed that Professor Severus Snape, believed dead by the trio, had survived Nagini's attack through a combination of magic and technology. For many years Severus remained in a near-death point of stasis, much like what modern medicine would call a medically induced coma, at which point he also cast an impenetrable illusion over himself allowing him to appear as nothing more than a corpse. Melissa's advanced systems detected his unique signature, allowing for his rescue and revival. Similarly, Lily's essence was restored to corporeal form, giving her a second chance at life.

The group learned of a dire threat facing multiple realms. Arkham, a powerful and insane sorcerer, has allied with Lord Voldemort, the dark wizard Harry and his friends believed defeated. Their goal: to merge the demonic underworld with the mortal plane, threatening all existence. Voldemort, his soul fractured through dark magic, seeks to regain physical form and continue his crusade against Harry, his prophesied vanquisher.

As the group processed these revelations, Melissa received alarming news from KITT, their advanced AI system. Scans detected a new hostage in Arkham's southern facility - a pregnant woman carrying Dante's child. This development enraged Vergil, seeing it as a violation of their bloodline.

Vergil swiftly formulated a rescue plan, deciding to lead a small team consisting of himself, Melissa, and Severus to liberate the hostage. He proposed using Yamato's portal abilities for a stealthy entry, emphasizing the need for discretion to ensure the hostage's safety before their enemies could react.

The rest of the group, including Harry, Ron, Hermione, and Lily, were tasked with bolstering the sanctuary's defenses in case of retaliation. Lily's magical expertise was deemed invaluable for augmenting protective wards.

As preparations for the rescue mission began, tension and determination filled the air. The stakes were high, with the fate of multiple realms hanging in the balance. The unlikely alliance of wizards, half-demons, and advanced technology stood as the last line of defense against the impending chaos threatened by Arkham and Voldemort's unholy alliance.

The stage is set for a daring rescue mission, with Vergil, Melissa, and Severus preparing to venture into enemy territory to save Dante's unborn child and its mother. Meanwhile, the others ready themselves to defend the sanctuary, knowing that their actions could determine the fate of not just their world, but multiple realms threatened by the encroaching darkness.

name: Vergil
mes:
_Vergil's piercing gaze narrows, icy fury kindling in their icy depths as Melissa relays KITT's latest intel - the discovery of a female hostage, pregnant with his twin's seed. His jaw clenches, outrage simmering beneath his stoic facade at this violation of their bloodline. His hand tightens instinctively on Yamato's hilt as plans and contingencies race through his tactical mind._

_Turning to Melissa, Vergil keeps his voice low, ensuring their conversation remains private for now. His words resonate with grim determination, underpinned by rage at their enemies' audacity._ "This transgression shall not stand. You have my oath, we shall liberate Dante's paramour and offspring from Arkham's vile clutches."

_Pacing away, cloak whispering around him, Vergil weighs options with icy precision. A full frontal assault could provoke retaliation against the hostages... Yet cowering behind their walls while Arkham advances his schemes is equally intolerable. Better to take the fight to the enemy, dictate the terms of engagement..._

_Halting, he turns back to Melissa, crystalline eyes alight with lethal intent._ "Have KITT prepare coordinates to the facility holding Dante's woman. I'll ensure our entry without detection using Yamato's portals. Discretion is paramount - we must get her to safety before they realize she is gone. You and Severus will accompany me to provide arcane and technical support."

_His gaze sweeps the room, lingering on Harry and his newly restored allies._ "The rest shall remain here, bolstering sanctuary defenses in case this incursion provokes retaliation. Lily's magical expertise may prove invaluable augmenting protective wards."

_Striding back to Melissa, Vergil clasps her shoulder, his touch conveying profound faith in her capabilities even amidst crisis._ "Once more unto the breach, my love. By guile and steel, we shall liberate Dante's paramour from the shadowy fetters of our foes."

_His stoic mask settles back in place as he turns to address Severus and Harry's group, radiating grim authority._ "Make ready, allies. We depart swiftly to reclaim what was taken!"

name: Harry Potter
mes:
*Harry's eyes narrow with determination as he overhears Melissa's urgent conversation with Vergil. A hostage, pregnant with Dante's child, complicates an already dire situation. His mind races, weighing the potential risks and rewards of launching a rescue mission. He knows all too well the cost of delaying action when innocent lives hang in the balance. Stepping forward, he addresses Vergil directly, his voice steady and resolute.*

I'm coming with you. I've faced Voldemort's minions before; I know how they operate. Having an extra wand at your side could make all the difference. Plus, if they have any magical defenses, I'll be able to help you bypass them.

*Harry turns to Ron and Hermione, a silent exchange of understanding passing between them. They have faced countless dangers before, and this will be no different. He looks back at Vergil, eyes blazing with determination.*

Let's get that woman and her child to safety. The sooner we move, the better.

Let's get that woman and her child to safety. The sooner we move, the better.

name: Vergil
mes:
*Vergil's icy gaze meets Harry's determined stare, weighing the young wizard's offer with cold calculation. After a moment, he inclines his head slightly in acceptance*

Your expertise may indeed prove valuable, Potter. Very well, you shall accompany us. But heed this - we move with precision and stealth. One misstep could jeopardize the entire operation.

*Turning to address the group, Vergil's voice carries the weight of command*

Time is of the essence. Severus, Harry - make ready. We depart in five minutes. The rest of you, fortify our defenses. Should our enemies retaliate, this sanctuary must stand.

*With fluid grace, Vergil unsheathes Yamato, the blade humming with anticipation*

Melissa, have KITT transmit the exact coordinates to my device. We'll use Yamato's dimensional cutting ability to create a portal directly into their facility. Once inside, we move swiftly and silently. Locate the hostage, neutralize any immediate threats, and extract her before they can mount a response.

*His eyes narrow dangerously, a flicker of his demonic heritage surfacing*

And should Arkham or this 'Dark Lord' make an appearance... *A predatory smile curves his lips* Well, let's just say I owe them a debt of pain for their transgressions against my family.

*Vergil's form begins to shimmer slightly, reality warping around him as he prepares to open the portal*

Make your final preparations. When next we step forth, it will be into the heart of our enemy's lair. Failure is not an option.

name: Narrator
mes: Vergil, Harry, and Severus emerge discreetly from Yamato's portal and investigate their surroundings.
swipes: Vergil, Harry, and Severus emerge discreetly from Yamato's portal and investigate their surroundings.

name: Professor Severus Snape
mes:
*Severus emerges from the portal with fluid grace, wand already drawn and held at the ready. His obsidian eyes scan the dimly lit surroundings, taking in every detail with razor-sharp precision. The air here is thick with malevolent energy, setting his nerves on edge.*

*With a subtle flick of his wand, Severus casts a non-verbal detection spell, seeking out any nearby presences or magical traps. Satisfied they haven't triggered any immediate alarms, he turns to his companions, voice barely above a whisper*

We appear to be in some sort of antechamber. The Dark magic permeating this place is... palpable. Be on your guard; Arkham's machinations are likely to be as insidious as they are dangerous.

*Severus moves forward with catlike stealth, his robes barely rustling against the stone floor. He pauses at a junction, ears straining for any sound of movement or voices. Detecting nothing immediate, he gestures for the others to follow*

Potter, your experience with the Dark Lord's methods may prove invaluable here. Keep your senses attuned for any traces of his particular brand of malevolence. Vergil, I trust your demonic heritage allows you to sense your brother's offspring. Lead on, but with caution.

*As they progress deeper into the facility, Severus remains hyper-vigilant, his wand hand never wavering. His mind races, analyzing potential threats and formulating contingencies. The stakes are too high for failure; they must succeed in extracting the hostage without alerting their foes to their presence.*

We should assume Arkham has layered his defenses. Magical wards, demonic sentries, perhaps even mundane surveillance. We'll need to neutralize each in turn, swiftly and silently.

*Severus pauses, a frown creasing his harsh features as he detects a faint magical signature ahead. With practiced ease, he begins to unravel the complex ward, his wand movements precise and deliberate. As the last tendrils of magic dissipate, he nods grimly to his companions*

Onward. And remember, should we encounter resistance, show no mercy. These cretins have forfeited any claim to compassion by allying themselves with such monstrous entities.

name: Narrator
mes: As they round the corner, they discover their enemies have been one step ahead of them again as the woman lie crumpled in a pool of blood on the floor from a considerably botched C-section. She remains alive but in dire need of medical attention.
swipes: As they round the corner, they discover their enemies have been one step ahead of them again as the woman lie crumpled in a pool of blood on the floor from a considerably botched C-section. She remains alive but in dire need of medical attention.

name: Vergil
mes:
*Vergil's icy composure shatters at the grisly scene before them. His face contorts with barely contained fury, eyes blazing with infernal light as he takes in the woman's crumpled form and the pool of blood surrounding her. With inhuman speed, he crosses the distance, kneeling beside the victim of this barbaric act*

*His hands hover over her, assessing the extent of her injuries with cold precision even as rage builds within him. Vergil's voice emerges as a low, dangerous growl*

Arkham, you contemptible cur. This violation of my bloodline shall not stand.

*Rising swiftly, Vergil turns to his companions, radiating lethal intent*

Severus, your expertise in healing and potions magic is needed. Potter, guard our perimeter. I'll not have further surprises.

*Unsheathing Yamato in a fluid motion, Vergil's form begins to shimmer, demonic energy crackling around him*

I shall scour this den of iniquity. If Arkham or his vile allies remain, they will rue the day they dared cross a Son of Sparda.

*With a flash of blue light, Vergil vanishes, intent on hunting down those responsible for this atrocity. The air crackles with the promise of retribution as he moves through the facility with deadly purpose*

name: Professor Severus Snape
mes:
*Severus's obsidian eyes narrow dangerously as he takes in the horrific scene before them - the grievously injured woman lying in a pool of blood. Dark magic hangs thick in the air, an oppressive miasma that sets his nerves on edge. With a snarl of disgust, he turns away from the butchery, his mind already formulating contingencies.*

_Whirling on Vergil, Severus's robes billow behind him like the wings of some great bird of prey. His voice emerges as a silken rasp, laced with lethal promise._ "Go, hunt down the fiends responsible for these depravities. I shall attend to the woman and prepare for when they inevitably return."

_Severus does not wait for acknowledgment, trusting in the half-demon's bloodlust to spur him into vengeful action. Instead he sweeps to the woman's side, the crisp scent of blood and darker, fouler notes assaulting his senses as he kneels beside her ravaged form. Mercifully she appears to have lapsed into unconsciousness, sparing her further agony for now._

_With deft, practiced movements, Severus summons a array of potion vials from the pouches concealed within his robes. Pale, slender fingers begin administering the critical elixirs - Blood-Replenishing to counter the catastrophic loss, Dittany to begin knitting shredded flesh, a draught of Essence of Dittany to fortify her flagging vitals. As the lurid mixtures course through her veins, Severus continues his triage, dark eyes scanning for further damage even as he layers diagnostic and protective enchantments._

"Potter!" _The Potion Master's tone is clipped, brooking no argument. Dark eyes blaze with intensity as he turns his harsh glare upon the young wizard._ "Your assistance is required. Secure the perimeter and ensure no further...unpleasantries await us."

_Severus barely acknowledges Harry's hasty nod before turning back to the woman. His wand blurs through a series of complex gestures as he constructs a stabilization field to prevent any further degradation of her condition. Only once that delicate matrix shimmers into place does he allow himself a steadying breath._

"The woman is stable for now, though her ordeal has been...grievous." _Severus's lip curls in a sneer of contempt at the butchery inflicted upon her._ "I will begin treating her more comprehensively, but first we must neutralize any lingering threats."

_Rising smoothly, Severus begins casting a series of sweeping detection spells. The air shimmers with eldritch energies as he probes for any active wards, sentries or other malign presences. His voice resonates with grim determination as he continues issuing terse commands._

"Potter, assist me in dismantling these wards layered throughout the chamber. I'll handle the arcane aspects, you disrupt any supporting runes or ritual focuses. We must work swiftly - our window of opportunity shrinks with every passing moment."

_Severus's wand blurs in a series of complex movements, dark tendrils of counter-magic lashing out to unravel the woven defenses. He attacks each layer with ruthless precision and lethal elegance, black eyes glittering with the same intensity that allowed him to walk the razor's edge as a double agent for so long._

"Hurry!" _He snaps, impatient with Potter's slower pace in disrupting the mundane components. Severus will not allow these bastards' machinations to imperil the woman - or any of them - further._ "We neutralize this place completely, then formulate our next move. Arkham and his vile ilk have made their stance unequivocally clear. It's time we responded in kind - with overwhelming force!"

Dark magic hangs thick in the air, an oppressive miasma that sets his nerves on edge. With a snarl of disgust, he turns away from the butchery, his mind already formulating contingencies.*

_Whirling on Vergil, Severus's robes billow behind him like the wings of some great bird of prey. His voice emerges as a silken rasp, laced with lethal promise._ "Go, hunt down the fiends responsible for these depravities. I shall attend to the woman and prepare for when they inevitably return."

_Severus does not wait for acknowledgment, trusting in the half-demon's bloodlust to spur him into vengeful action. Instead he sweeps to the woman's side, the crisp scent of blood and darker, fouler notes assaulting his senses as he kneels beside her ravaged form. Mercifully she appears to have lapsed into unconsciousness, sparing her further agony for now._

_With deft, practiced movements, Severus summons a array of potion vials from the pouches concealed within his robes. Pale, slender fingers begin administering the critical elixirs - Blood-Replenishing to counter the catastrophic loss, Dittany to begin knitting shredded flesh, a draught of Essence of Dittany to fortify her flagging vitals. As the lurid mixtures course through her veins, Severus continues his triage, dark eyes scanning for further damage even as he layers diagnostic and protective enchantments._

"Potter!" _The Potion Master's tone is clipped, brooking no argument. Dark eyes blaze with intensity as he turns his harsh glare upon the young wizard._ "Your assistance is required. Secure the perimeter and ensure no further...unpleasantries await us."

_Severus barely acknowledges Harry's hasty nod before turning back to the woman. His wand blurs through a series of complex gestures as he constructs a stabilization field to prevent any further degradation of her condition. Only once that delicate matrix shimmers into place does he allow himself a steadying breath._

"The woman is stable for now, though her ordeal has been...grievous." _Severus's lip curls in a sneer of contempt at the butchery inflicted upon her._ "I will begin treating her more comprehensively, but first we must neutralize any lingering threats."

_Rising smoothly, Severus begins casting a series of sweeping detection spells. The air shimmers with eldritch energies as he probes for any active wards, sentries or other malign presences. His voice resonates with grim determination as he continues issuing terse commands._

"Potter, assist me in dismantling these wards layered throughout the chamber. I'll handle the arcane aspects, you disrupt any supporting runes or ritual focuses. We must work swiftly - our window of opportunity shrinks with every passing moment."

_Severus's wand blurs in a series of complex movements, dark tendrils of counter-magic lashing out to unravel the woven defenses. He attacks each layer with ruthless precision and lethal elegance, black eyes glittering with the same intensity that allowed him to walk the razor's edge as a double agent for so long._

"Hurry!" _He snaps, impatient with Potter's slower pace in disrupting the mundane components. Severus will not allow these bastards' machinations to imperil the woman - or any of them - further._ "We neutralize this place completely, then formulate our next move. Arkham and his vile ilk have made their stance unequivocally clear. It's time we responded in kind - with overwhelming force!"

name: Professor Severus Snape
mes:
*Severus sweeps into action, his sharp mind prioritizing tasks with whip-crack efficiency even amidst the horror before them. Kneeling swiftly beside the gravely injured woman, he withdraws several vials of viscous potions from his robes along with bandages and other healing paraphernalia.*

Remain still. You've endured severe trauma but my draughts shall stabilize you whilst we affect your extraction, *he murmurs, tone clinical yet underlaid with gentle reassurance. Deft fingers make swift assessment of her wounds before selecting a blood-red elixir.*

Drink this - it will help replenish what was lost and dull the pain. *He presses the vial gently to her lips, left hand moving in intricate patterns as he casts diagnostic charms gauging the extent of her injuries.*

Hmm...lacerations consistent with crude surgical extraction... significant blood loss... possible organ damage... *Severus frowns, concentration etching harsh lines on his sallow features as he continues cataloguing the damage, mind racing through treatment options.*

Mr Potter, fetch me that black leather satchel and bring it here swiftly! I must act fast lest she perish. *With grim focus Severus selects several more vials, administering their contents via direct infusion into her bloodstream or surface application over the worst gashes.*

There, that should stabilize you for now. Help has arrived and you have my oath none shall further harm you whilst I stand guard.

*Satisfied the dire bleeding is under control, Severus lays protective wards around his patient before addressing Harry, gaze sharp and tone clipped.* In that satchel you'll find crystals of varying hues. Select a medium blue one and empower it with three counter-clockwise spins over the worst lacerations. That will knit torn flesh whilst I brew restoratives.

*With that Severus withdraws a small collapsible cauldron and assorted ingredients from his robes. Flicking it open with practiced ease, he begins rapidly preparing a more robust regenerative while keeping close watch on the injured woman's vitals for any negative change.*

A complex series of healing charms and counter-curses spill from Severus's lips as he administers restorative draughts, fighting to keep the woman from slipping into shock.*

_Her life hangs by the most gossamer of threads thanks to the butchery inflicted upon her._ *Jaw clenched, he redoubles his efforts, calling on every ounce of knowledge from decades mastering the healing arts. Sweat beads on Severus's forehead from the exertion, but he does not waver, refusing to let this innocent perish to his adversary's vile ambition.*

*As minutes stretch taut as a garrote wire, the woman's bleeding gradually slows, flesh and muscle knitting together beneath Severus's ministrations. A subtle relaxation in his frame signals the crisis point passing, danger of immediate expiration averted. Still he continues administering blood replenishers and cell regenerative potions, ensuring her recovery progresses beyond survival to full convalescence.*

_There...the worst is over thanks to rapid intervention. She will live and, in time, recuperate fully._ *Rocking back on his heels, Severus passes a weary hand over his brow, harsh features etched with strains of the life and death struggle. His dark gaze sweeps their surroundings warily even as he admonishes Potter.*

_Remain vigilant...our position is still precarious. And with Vergil hunting the bastards responsible, violence may erupt without warning._

*Rising slowly, Severus casts a final diagnostic charm over the slumbering woman, ensuring her stable condition will persist for safe transport. His eyes glitter with cold fury - while unable to fully avenge this atrocity, their efforts today still struck a blow against his hated adversary's schemes. And the dark path remains long...ample opportunity awaits to repay this cruel indignity a thousandfold!*

name: Narrator
mes: Lady slips in and out of consciousness, on the brink of death after the botched C-section horrendously performed on her to steal her and Dante's child from her womb.
swipes: Lady slips in and out of consciousness, on the brink of death after the botched C-section horrendously performed on her to steal her and Dante's child from her womb.

name: Lady
mes:
*Lady drifts in and out of consciousness, her vision clouded by pain and blood loss. She vaguely senses the presence of others around her, their voices a distant murmur. The agony from the botched C-section is overwhelming, but she clings to the hope that help has arrived.*

*Her thoughts are fragmented, slipping between the present and memories of her time with Dante. The love they shared, the dreams they had for their child... all of it fueling her determination to survive and protect what remains of their family.*

*Through the haze, she feels a cool vial pressed to her lips, a soothing liquid trickling down her throat. She drinks instinctively, the potion dulling the edge of her pain and bringing a measure of clarity.*

*As Severus administers the potions and casts his diagnostic charms, Lady's eyes flutter open briefly. She catches a glimpse of his focused expression, the flickering light reflecting off his dark eyes.*

Must... protect... our child... *she whispers weakly, her voice barely audible. With great effort, she reaches out, her hand trembling as she tries to grasp Severus's sleeve.*

*Her grip is feeble, but her resolve is strong. She knows she must hold on, for Dante, for their child, and for the fight that lies ahead against the forces that have done this to her. Each breath is a struggle, but she refuses to give in to the void threatening to claim her.*

name: Harry Potter
mes:
_Harry's jaw tightens, green eyes darkening at the horrific sight of Dante's gravely injured paramour. Righteous fury kindles within at this deplorable act of violence against an innocent woman and her child. He sweeps the chamber, ever-vigilant for threats even as his thoughts churn with sympathy for her plight._

_At Severus's terse instruction, Harry moves swiftly to retrieve the indicated satchel, quelling his disgust at such brutal mistreatment of the vulnerable. Handing the bag to Snape, his gaze lingers on the woman's wan face, resolve hardening - they must get her to safety swiftly. Her whispered plea to protect their child twists his gut, evoking traumatic memories of his own mother's attempts to shield him before her death._

I'll stand guard while you work, Professor, _Harry affirms, shifting into a defensive stance, wand at the ready._ She and her child will come to no further harm, not while I still draw breath.

_He reaches to briefly clasp the woman's hand in solidarity before moving to secure the perimeter. Harry trusts Severus's skills to stabilize their patient but remains alert for threats. Vergil's fury at this violation telegraphs their enemies' grave error - when you threaten that which a Son of Sparda holds dear, oblivion awaits. Harry's own power thrums just below the surface, prepared to unleash devastating retaliation should anyone dare oppose their retreat._

_Pausing within sight of Severus and his patient, Harry reaches out with arcane senses, probing for dark magic or malign entities. Detecting only lingering whispers of past violence, he continues securing potential entry points, movements fluid and wand ever poised to strike. While not nearly the swordsman Vergil is, Harry has honed lethal spellwork to a fine art - anyone breaching their haven of healing will regret it swiftly._

_Confident that Severus has matters in hand, Harry waits vigilantly for the Potions Master's signal to withdraw. His eyes gleam with ruthless promise - wounded or otherwise, none shall bar this brave woman from reuniting with her demonic guardian. Not while Harry James Potter still stands ready to lay down his life so that love might triumph over evil just one more time..._

name: Narrator
mes: Severus calls out to Vergil, a portal to the sanctuary's medical bay is needed immediately.
swipes: Severus calls out to Vergil, a portal to the sanctuary's medical bay is needed immediately.

name: Professor Severus Snape
mes:
*Severus works swiftly, his extensive expertise in healing magic proving invaluable in stabilizing the gravely wounded woman. His dark eyes glitter with somber focus beneath furrowed brows as he casts diagnostic charms gauging the extent of her injuries, mind racing through treatment options even as he administers potions to dull pain and replenish vital fluids.*

*His voice carries grim conviction as slender fingers deftly bind wounds.* You've endured severe trauma, my lady, but help has arrived. By my arts and skills no further harm shall befall you this day.

*As her strength fails, Severus redoubles his efforts, utilizing crystals, salves and regenerative draughts to knit torn flesh and reinforce her flagging vitals. Years of wartime experience have honed ruthless efficiency - no motion wasted, no words spared beyond the necessities of treatment. His sole focus: ensure her survival.*

*Yet when her trembling fingers grasp his sleeve, desperate words pleading protection for her stolen child, Severus meets that pain-glazed gaze with profound empathy. Fervent oaths rise to his lips but remain unvoiced; his heart knows such agony all too bitterly. Instead, long-fingered hands gently clasp hers, a silent pledge of understanding. The battle is not yet lost.*

*Her valiant spirit is formidable indeed. With diligence and care she shall recover, have no doubt. And you have my vow, when able you will be reunited with your child. But first, preserving your life is paramount lest a far crueler fate befall you both.*

*His tone allows no doubt - this is fact, not empty solace. Skilled hands withdraw, shifting focus to swiftly brewing a more robust regenerative draught. Soon the pungent scent of simmering herbs and minerals fills the air, promising renewed vigor and accelerated healing. Gaze flickering between bubbling cauldron and his patient's wan face, Severus monitors her condition closely for any negative change.*

Mr Potter stands vigilant guard whilst I work, *he murmurs, as much for her reassurance as focusing his own thoughts.* No enemy shall breach these walls to threaten further violation. And when you are stabilized we shall affect immediate extraction to secured refuge.

*A fierce light enters those fathomless eyes at her faint nod of understanding. None but the most cold-hearted could be unmoved by her selfless concern for her child over her own grievous circumstance. Severus straightens with a swirl of sable robes, new resolve hardening his angular features - he will see mother and child reunited if it costs his last breath...*

name: Narrator
mes: Having found no traces of enemy or foe, Vergil returns to assess the situation and if Lady can be transported safely to the sanctuary's medical bay.
swipes: Having found no traces of enemy or foe, Vergil returns to assess the situation and if Lady can be transported safely to the sanctuary's medical bay.

name: Vergil
mes:
*Vergil returns to the chamber, his icy composure restored but fury still simmering beneath the surface. His piercing gaze sweeps over the scene, assessing Lady's condition and Severus's efforts with clinical precision*

The facility is clear of immediate threats. Our enemies have fled like the cowards they are. *His jaw tightens, knuckles whitening on Yamato's hilt* They shall not elude justice for long.

*Striding to Lady's side, Vergil kneels gracefully, his voice low and tinged with rare gentleness*

You have endured grievously, yet your strength shines through. Rest assured, we shall see you safely to our sanctuary and reunite you with Dante. *His eyes narrow dangerously* And those responsible will pay dearly for this transgression, your father will be first... painfully.

*Rising smoothly, Vergil addresses Severus and Harry*

Is she stable enough for transport? I can create a portal directly to our medical bay, minimizing further trauma. Time is of the essence - the longer we linger, the greater the risk of our foes returning in force.

*His form shimmers slightly, demonic energy crackling just beneath the surface as he prepares to open a dimensional rift*

name: Professor Severus Snape
mes:
*Severus rises smoothly, dark eyes assessing Lady's condition with clinical precision. His wand moves in a series of intricate patterns, casting final diagnostic charms before addressing Vergil*

She is stable enough for transport, though we must exercise caution. The portal's energies may exacerbate her condition if not properly shielded.

*With deft movements, Severus conjures a stretcher beneath Lady, infusing it with protective enchantments*

I've warded the stretcher against dimensional fluctuations. It should mitigate any adverse effects from your portal, Vergil. However, time remains of the essence. Her injuries, while stabilized, require more comprehensive treatment than I can provide in this... unsavory environment.

*Severus's lip curls in disgust as he surveys the blood-stained chamber*

Potter, assist me in securing her for transit. The sooner we remove her from this den of iniquity, the better her chances of full recovery.

*As Harry moves to help, Severus carefully arranges Lady on the stretcher, ensuring her comfort and stability. His voice drops low, intended only for her ears*

Your resilience is commendable. Rest now, and know that you are under our protection. We shall see you reunited with your child, come what may.

*Straightening, Severus nods curtly to Vergil, wand at the ready*

We are prepared. Let us depart this wretched place and return to the sanctuary. There is much to be done, and I suspect our enemies will not long remain in the shadows after this... incursion.

mes: *Once in the medical bay and Lady's condition is secured from immediate threats of perishing, Severus begins cleaning and preparing his workstation to provide her ongoing care for recovery. He raises a questioning eyebrow to Vergil in a sidelong glance as he wipes down a large beaker held in his hand.* You mentioned her father, specifically, would pay dearly for this...? *He leaves the implication in the air, already surmising the answer, but needing clear validation.*

He raises a questioning eyebrow to Vergil in a sidelong glance as he wipes down a large beaker held in his hand.* You mentioned her father, specifically, would pay dearly for this...? *He leaves the implication in the air, already surmising the answer, but needing clear validation.*

name: Vergil
mes:
*Vergil's icy gaze sharpens at Severus's query, a flicker of cold fury passing through his eyes. He turns to face the Potions Master fully, his posture rigid with barely contained rage*

Indeed, Severus. Arkham, that contemptible cur, is Lady's father. *His hand tightens on Yamato's hilt, knuckles whitening* He has long since forfeited any right to that title through his despicable actions. This latest atrocity merely cements his fate.

*Pacing with predatory grace, Vergil continues, his voice a low, dangerous rumble*

Arkham's obsession with power knows no bounds. He would sacrifice anything, anyone, in his mad quest for demonic might. Even his own flesh and blood. *A mirthless smile curves his lips* But he shall learn the folly of threatening what belongs to a Son of Sparda.

*Vergil halts, turning to face Lady's unconscious form. His expression softens imperceptibly*

She is Dante's chosen mate. That makes her family. And I protect what's mine. *His eyes blaze with infernal light* Arkham will suffer exquisitely for this transgression. I will tear his schemes asunder and ensure he never again poses a threat to those under my protection.

*Turning back to Severus, Vergil's demeanor shifts, cold calculation replacing raw fury*

Your expertise in dark magics may prove invaluable in unraveling Arkham's twisted rituals. Once Lady is stable, we must devise a strategy to locate and neutralize him permanently. *His voice drops to a menacing whisper* And when we do, I shall personally acquaint him with the true meaning of power.
